title: PRM-FP-0007: Add integration tests for pipeline run mode
description: Add integration tests covering hashed JSONL input to fingerprint output: all-matched, partial no-match, upstream _skipped passthrough, new _skipped parse failures, and refusal envelopes.

title: PRM-FP-0006: Build unit test suite for assertion engine
description: Add unit tests for DSL assertion evaluation and refusal edges: sheet/cell/range assertions, order/short-circuit behavior, unknown assertion handling, and deterministic error payloads.

title: PRM-FP-0001: Release infra parity audit vs rvl
description: Compare fingerprint repo release/build infra against rvl baseline (CI, release.yml, artifact signing/checksums, GH release notes, Homebrew bump path). Produce concrete gap list and acceptance checklist, then track closure in follow-up beads.

title: PRM-FP-0009: Add golden-output determinism tests
description: Add golden fixtures for known inputs/fingerprints and assert byte-stable JSONL output + content_hash determinism + witness record schema stability.

title: PRM-FP-0002: Add rvl-style CI workflow baseline
description: Implement .github/workflows/ci.yml parity with rvl style: deterministic setup, lint/test/build steps, failure-fast behavior, and clear status checks. Include witness-related test invocation once tests exist.

title: PRM-FP-0010: Enforce coverage in CI
description: Add CI gates that require passing unit/integration/smoke/golden suites and prevent merges when coverage-critical suites are skipped or broken.

title: PRM-FP-0004: Wire Homebrew release path parity
description: Add Homebrew/tap update path matching rvl behavior (formula bump automation and validation). Ensure release workflow can trigger and verify brew install path for fingerprint binaries.

title: PRM-FP-0005: Test coverage parity plan vs rvl
description: Audit current fingerprint tests against rvl coverage model (unit, integration, smoke, golden, witness command coverage). Produce missing-test matrix and convert it into executable test beads.
close_reason: parity matrix completed and gaps converted to executable beads

comments.author: Zac
comments.text: Completed PRM-FP-0005 parity review. Added docs/TEST_COVERAGE_PARITY.md with evidence-based matrix versus rvl (213 src tests, 111 integration tests, 120 fixture files baseline vs 0 today in fingerprint). Confirmed all identified gaps are mapped to executable beads; added bd-9in for fixture corpus and linked dependencies from bd-1zd/bd-18y/bd-kmi/bd-2ka.

title: PRM-FP-0011: Build fixture corpus for fingerprint tests
description: Create representative fixture corpus for csv/xlsx/pdf plus failure paths (corrupt files, unsupported formats, upstream _skipped manifests, refusal-trigger cases). Fixtures must support unit/integration/smoke/golden and witness tests.

title: PRM-FP-0008: Add smoke tests for CLI surfaces
description: Add smoke/E2E tests for CLI entry points: run mode, compile mode, --list, --describe, --schema, witness query/last/count, and exit-code routing (0/1/2).

title: PRM-FP-0003: Add rvl-style release workflow
description: Implement .github/workflows/release.yml parity with rvl style so a pushed version tag builds release artifacts, publishes GitHub release, and runs required verification gates before publish.
